website_summaries.verdict: The perfect choice for anyone who can't stand the strong smell of most nail repair formulas.
pros: When applied often, the results are noticeable quickly
This Sally Hansen formula is an oil that you rub into nails and cuticles
The formula is thick and easy to rub in
We loved not having to wait for dry times – just rub it in and go
While this product does have that typical nail polish scent, we did notice it wasn't as strong as most
cons: This product tends to require more consistent application than most to achieve results

customer_reviews.title: Waited a full 6 days for my order and it was wrong !!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered nail SERUM x3 and received nail POLISH x 3. Prohibited from sending polish back !!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher John Lupton

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT THE SERUM! It's like nail polish.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected. I was looking for the serum and this is NOT the serum. The title is misleading. But I still got a product that is usable so am not expecting any compensation or anything like that. This ended up being like a clear nail polish. It doesn't work as obviously as the serum does, it's hard to say if it makes anything grow faster but I have also not been applying it as often as other reviewers. If you are looking for the gooey gel that you just rub on your nails, make sure you get the one that says "SERUM" on the BOTTLE TOO, not just in the amazon title.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. My nails are brittle and break down to the quick which is painful. I started using this about 6 months ago and now have beautiful long strong nails. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Micheale Smith

customer_reviews.title: BUY NOW
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it ain`t cheap but I was skeptical that this wouldn`t work. WRONG. It works amazingly. I bite my nails a lot and after using this for 2 weeks, my nails are really long and pretty I`ve stopped biting them. This is the best nail growth product out there for quick results and I`ve tried quite a few
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: No difference in nail growth or strength
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to strengthen my nails after several dip manicures left my nails paper thin. Product dries quickly into a pretty, pearl like finish. Directions suggest applying a thin coat every other day. After three or four coats the product peels. It may work better over a base coat but then the "growth treatment" won't penetrate nails. However, research suggests nails don't absorb nutrients or strengther, anyway. Oral vitamens probably work much better for nail growth and strength.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Follow The Directions In The Comments!
customer_reviews.text: I applied and removed the poilish daily after pushing my cuticles back, and OMG I seen results the next day. This polish dries quickly and is sooo pretty! My nails did feel weird the first 3 days, but it was just the product doing its thing. Happy customer! 🥰Thanks ladies!
customer_reviews.author: C. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Apply new coat every other day after removing old coat!
customer_reviews.text: The trick is that you have to remove the old coat and push cuticles down and apply a new"thin coat every other day. Follow these steps and watch it amaze you!! I have short thin nails that break so easily and great my nails so long! The best part is once you get in the groove they grow so fast that even a broken nail catches up very quickly!!!!👍😁 no joke. It's awesome if u use it correctly
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is less expensive on Amazon than in the store. I’ve been using fir almost a week & notice a bug difference in my nails. They are no longer splitting & feel stronger. I will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Used it in conjunction with OPI nail envy and my nails are amazing. The before and after pics are exactly two months apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this polish. I could never keep long nails because mine were super thin and tore easily. Now they are thicker, strong and longer. I recommend it to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: MyTina1970

customer_reviews.title: A trusted name for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: Sally Hansen nail products have been around for a long time. I've tried other products, but they tend to get thick after brief usage and peel off after a few days. Not the case with this product. It is still easy to apply and lasts for multiple applications. My one wish is that the bottle were see-through so you could see how much product is left.
customer_reviews.author: The Jazzy One

customer_reviews.title: Great treatment
customer_reviews.text: Great treatment for your nails. I've used it several times and its helped with reducing splitting. Its not very thick so I do about 2 or 3 coats to make sure its on pretty well. The price point is great too as its super affordable compared to other products on the market
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hackman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I admit, I do not use this every other day or anything like that, but it DOES work. My nails were peeling, breaking, thin, just yuck...I did use this as directed for 2 weeks, though, & saw noticeable results. My nails were stronger, thicker, and actually grew a bit. I use it maybe 3x a week now & still, the results are great, no more breaking or peeling. Don't expect your nails to suddenly grow into long talons, bit they will definitely get longer/stronger.
customer_reviews.author: 6catds

customer_reviews.title: Fancy packaging. Nice shine.
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging. Quick drying time. Very nice shine when applied. (Left finger has no polish. Right finger has polish). My nails are thin sure to having dip gel nails for a long time. Looking forward to strengthening my nails with this mail growth miracle product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: 100% my nails are growing like crazy, this is only with three weeks using this product. They feel strong and healthy. I love this product
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for me. After applying for a couple of weeks, I saw no difference in my nails. Then, my nails starting breaking off, cracking, and splitting. They look horrible. My nails are shorter than they have ever been. They have split and broke off way beyond the tip of my fingers. I’ve used Sally Hansen before, but not this one. I wish I had never gotten this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tate

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: I remember my mother purchasing this from the drugstores and it still has an amazing affect! And results! Had to purchase one!

customer_reviews.title: Strong & Long
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been polishing my nails with this two times a week, for two months, and my nails are strong, they don’t break or split. I play piano and ukulele and keep them filed to my fingertips, which is perfect, can’t play with them any longer. I don’t go to the nail salon any more and pay $40 a month. And I still have half a bottle left, great value!
customer_reviews.author: Eve J.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: My nails are soft, they break real easy, and they peel. After reading the reviews, I decided to try this, and I am so glad I did. My nails are growing because they are now harder, therefore not breaking or peeling. I love this stuff!

customer_reviews.title: Great Formula!
customer_reviews.text: Love the formula of this but I think I got a defective brush this time! Works super well, but brush is flimsy and not very sturdy. I just switched it out and it’s as good as new.

customer_reviews.title: Great

(Which weren't an issue before using this product!) I'm so disappointed!

Nails continued to break at the white for two weeks, but by week 3 were growing out stronger.

It's sort of like a clear nail polish but it seems to absorb into your nails after a couple of days unless you reapply every day. After a couple weeks of use, I do notice a decent difference. Nails seem stronger and are growing longer. Not as much chipping and peeling. I will continue to use this until I can find something similar to what I used years ago.

product_meta.title: Sally Hansen Miracle Nails Nailgrowth Treatment 0.45 Fl Oz
product_meta.description: Color:Growth Treatment| Size:1 PackSally Hansen nailgrowth miracle, is a professional-strength treatment that promotes speedy nail growth without brittleness
feature_bullets: BRUSH-ON NAIL STRENGTHENER: Nails growing slow? Gives them a boost with Sally Hansen's Nailgrowth Miracle Serum, and see 30% longer nails in 5 days, guaranteed*. Exclusive formula supports fast, natural, healthy nail growth, for stronger, longer nails.

STRONG, HEALTHY NAILS: Keratin and soy protein formula help protect nails against splitting, cracking and tearing; strengthening nails so they can grow longer without brittleness. Collagen and multi-vitamin formula promotes natural healthy nail growth.

ICONIC NAILS & BEAUTY: Since 1957, we've been the go-to brand for salon-gorgeous nails. From Hard As Nails, to Insta-Dri, Diamond Strength, & Miracle Gel nail polishes, & our range of nail & beauty products. When it comes to beauty, we've got you covered.

SALLY HANSEN INC-- Launched with just two nail products, including the iconic ‘Hard As Nails’, the award-winning nail care & color brand now has over 300 shades, is distributed in over 55 countries worldwide, & is the number one nail brand in the U.S.A.

OUTSHINING OUR COMPETITORS HANDS DOWN--Our products compare favorably to those from Butter, Essie, Revlon, China Glaze, Zeva, OPI, Indexu, Maybelline, Color Club, Seche Vite, , Sinful Shellac nail polish, Zoya, and Gel Nail Polish.
